job_description:
Senior Business Analyst

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead requirement workshops, client calls, and discovery discussions to understand business needs clearly.
  • Ask deeper questions, challenge assumptions, and validate the true business intent behind every requirement.
  • Convert ambiguous client inputs into structured, logical, and actionable functional understanding.
  • Break large features into modules, workflows, components, and clear dependencies.
  • Build strong system-level understanding involving APIs, integrations, data flow, and backend considerations.
  • Translate business processes into functional logic that development teams can execute.
  • Decompose requirements into use-case flows, system behaviours, edge cases, alternate paths, validation rules, and dependencies.
  • Prepare high-quality documentation, including BRD, FRD, SRS, workflows, state diagrams, data-flow diagrams, API requirement specs, and acceptance criteria.
  • Ensure all documentation is clear, logical, structured, testable, and ready for developers and QA to use.
  • Collaborate closely with developers, architects, QA, and product owners to validate feasibility and align understanding.
  • Ensure QA teams can derive test cases effectively from your functional logic and acceptance criteria.
  • Communicate confidently with clients, handle requirement discussions smoothly, and clarify misunderstandings immediately.
  • Push back politely on unclear or changing requirements and ensure final decisions are documented properly.
  • Maintain requirement traceability throughout the lifecycle and ensure zero ambiguity during handover to development.
  • Own the entire requirement lifecycle from discovery to development readiness with high accountability.
  • Drive clarity across teams by ensuring every requirement is complete, validated, and logically consistent.

Requirements

Required Skills & Experience

  • Minimum 4+ years of core Business Analyst experience with strong analytical and system-level thinking.
  • Ability to break down complex requirements into clear components, workflows, and functional logic.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication with confidence in client interactions and clarifications.
  • Proven experience in preparing SRS, BRD, FRD, workflows, and acceptance criteria with high clarity.
  • Ability to challenge assumptions politely, ask the right questions, and ensure zero ambiguity.
  • Strong collaboration experience with development, QA, architects, and cross-functional teams.
  • Understanding of API behaviours, integrations, data flows, and multi-module system interactions.
  • Ability to run requirement discussions, workshops, and independently lead discovery sessions.
  • Exposure to SaaS, scalable products, automation, or AI-supported systems is an added advantage.
  • Demonstrated ownership of requirements end-to-end, ensuring developer-ready and testable outputs.
  • Not suitable for UI-only thinkers, passive communicators, template-based writers, or those relying on AI for answers.
  • Success is defined by clear, testable requirements, zero rework, strong cross-team alignment, and confident communication.
  • Candidates must align with 2Base’s structured thinking, clarity-driven culture, and transformation of the BA function.

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field
  • 4 to 8 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst
  • Experience in SaaS or scalable product environments
  • Exposure to AI/Automation, integrations, or multi-module systems
  • Ability to run independent client workshops
  • Must have independently handled requirement ownership for at least one full project lifecycle

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Senior Business Analyst translates business needs into structured functional requirements, collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure clarity and testable outputs. Requires 4+ years of experience in SaaS environments with strong system-level thinking and documentation skills.

job_description:
Business Analyst

The Business Analyst plays a key role in ensuring requirements are clearly understood, accurately documented, and traceable throughout the software development lifecycle. This role focuses on translating business and functional inputs into structured, standardized documentation that supports effective development, testing, and delivery. Working closely with business analysts, design teams, and technical stakeholders, the role ensures consistency, clarity, and alignment across all requirement artifacts.

Key Responsibilities

  • Create Software Requirement Specifications (SRS) based on inputs from Core Business Analysts, stakeholder discussions, and requirement walkthroughs
  • Prepare Business Requirement Documents (BRD) using approved templates while ensuring business intent and system behavior are clearly documented
  • Participate in requirement discussions to understand business objectives, functional flows, dependencies, and assumptions before documentation
  • Analyze requirements to identify gaps, ambiguities, and inconsistencies, and work with Core BAs to resolve them
  • Document functional flows, business rules, and acceptance criteria where applicable to support development and QA teams
  • Document wireframes, UI flows, validations, and UI specifications in collaboration with design and product teams
  • Maintain change logs, version history, and document updates throughout the project lifecycle
  • Create and manage traceability matrices linking business, functional, and technical requirements
  • Maintain cross-references across BRD, SRS, UI, API, and related documentation
  • Ensure documentation consistency, completeness, and alignment with approved scope and delivery timelines
  • Ensure accurate and timely PMS updates with structured documentation details
  • Support development, QA, UAT, and audit processes through clear, traceable, and up-to-date documentation
  • Assist in requirement reviews, walkthroughs, and validation sessions with internal and client stakeholders

Requirements

Required Skills and Experience

  • 1 to 4 years of experience in Business Analysis documentation or related roles
  • Strong experience in BRD and SRS creation
  • Hands-on experience with documentation templates, standards, and version control
  • Ability to document UI wireframes and functional flows clearly
  • Working knowledge of APIs and system integrations for documentation purposes
  • Experience with project management systems and documentation tools
  • Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple documents in parallel
  • Excellent written communication and stakeholder coordination skills

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field
  • 1 to 4 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com
summary: Translates business requirements into structured documentation, ensuring clarity and alignment across teams. Collaborates with stakeholders to maintain accurate, traceable documentation for development and QA processes.

job_description:

Company Overview GS-IT, a leading IT company in Dubai, is committed to excellence, offering professional IT support for infrastructure, IT maintenance, AV, cloud services, cyber security, and strategic IT consulting to drive business success.

Job Description

Responsibilities

  1. Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  2. Plan and execute end-to-end SEO strategies aligned with business goals focused on IT industry.
  3. Perform in-depth keyword research, competitive analysis, and search intent analysis.
  4. Implement advanced on-page optimization: semantic keywords, internal linking, content clustering, CTR optimization.
  5. Manage and enhance off-page SEO: high-quality link building, digital PR outreach, backlink audits.
  6. Conduct regular technical SEO audits and collaborate with developers to resolve issues related to:
    • Crawlability & indexing
    • Site architecture
    • Page speed & Core Web Vitals
    • Schema markup & structured data
  7. Oversee local SEO efforts including Google Business Profile and local citations.
  8. Track and optimize rankings, organic traffic, and conversions using Google Analytics, Search Console, or similar tools.
  9. Identify new growth opportunities through algorithm trends, SERP behavior, and industry insights.

  10. Plan and execute emerging AI trends and integrate AI-driven insights into SEO strategies and adapt to algorithm changes.

  11. Content Strategy & Optimization

  12. Support and guide the content team with SEO-driven content briefs, keyword mapping, and topical authority planning.
  13. Optimize content for user intent, featured snippets, voice search, and rich results.
  14. Review and update existing content to improve ranking potential and user engagement.

  15. Ensure all content meets SEO best practices, readability standards, and brand guidelines.

  16. Performance Monitoring & Reporting

  17. Set up SEO dashboards and reporting frameworks for ongoing performance analysis.
  18. Prepare monthly SEO reports with insights, outcomes, and strategic recommendations.
  19. Analyze conversion paths, landing page performance, and behavioral metrics to improve UX and retention.

  20. Provide actionable suggestions to improve website visibility, structure, and search performance.

  21. Collaboration & Digital Marketing Support

  22. Coordinate with design, content, and development teams to ensure SEO integration across all digital assets.
  23. Support broader digital marketing activities, including campaign optimization and landing page improvements.
  24. Ensure alignment of SEO roadmap with overall digital marketing goals.
  25. Support digital marketing team in enquiry management via chats, calls, or email.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, IT, Computer Science, Business, or related fields.
  • 2–3 years proven experience in SEO with measurable results.
  • Solid understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and on-page/off-page strategies.
  • Good knowledge of HTML, CSS basics, CMS platforms, and website architecture.
  • Experience using Google Search Console, Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, etc.
  • Familiarity with Core Web Vitals, schema markup, and other technical SEO enhancements.
  • Understanding of AI trends and AI-driven insights in SEO.
  • Strong analytical skills with ability to interpret data and convert insights into strategy.
  • Excellent communication, documentation, and project management skills.

How to Apply

Please send your updated CV to talenthunt@globalsurf.ae with the subject line: “Application for SEO Specialist – GS IT”.

SEO #SearchEngineOptimization #InfoparkKochi
summary: SEO Specialist at GS-IT drives IT-focused SEO strategies, content optimization, and technical audits. Requires 2-3 years of experience with measurable SEO results and AI integration.

This role requires the engineer to operate across L1 and L2 support responsibilities, combining proactive monitoring with advanced troubleshooting and root cause analysis.

  • Perform real-time monitoring and alert response using Azure Monitor, Log Analytics, Application Insights, and third-party monitoring tools.
  • Manage and support Azure Virtual Machines (Windows and Linux) including provisioning, scaling, start/stop, patching, backup, restore, and performance troubleshooting.
  • Support Azure networking components including Virtual Networks (VNets), Subnets, Network Security Groups (NSGs), User Defined Routes (UDRs), Load Balancers, Application Gateways, Azure Firewall, VPN Gateways, and ExpressRoute connectivity.
  • Administer and support Azure Active Directory / Entra ID, including user and group management, role-based access control (RBAC), conditional access, and identity troubleshooting.
  • Support Azure Storage services (Blob, File, Disk, Queue, Table) including access control, performance tuning, capacity management, and issue resolution.
  • Provide L1/L2 support for Azure PaaS services such as App Services, Azure SQL, Managed Instances, and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), focusing on availability, connectivity, and configuration-related issues.
  • Perform capacity planning and performance analysis, proactively identifying resource constraints and recommending scaling or optimization actions.

  • Manage cost monitoring and optimization activities by identifying underutilized resources, supporting right-sizing efforts, and providing usage insights.

  • System Administration & Remote Support

  • Manage users in Windows Terminal Server / Remote Desktop Services (RDS) environments, both on-premises and hosted.
  • Act as a Remote Administrator for Customer Windows Servers, including user account management, shared file access, print services, and print queue configuration.
  • Support Windows print services, server backup, restore, and recovery operations.

  • Perform routine OS patching, system maintenance, and health checks across Windows and Linux environments.

  • Networking & Firewall Administration

  • Support and administer Fortinet / FortiGate firewalls, including policy management, site-to-site and dial-up VPN configuration, VLAN setup, and basic network troubleshooting.
  • Troubleshoot customer WAN, LAN, and VPN connectivity issues, including routing and firewall policy problems.
  • Diagnose and resolve local LAN and network-related issues impacting application and infrastructure availability.

  • Collaborate with internal and customer network teams to ensure secure and reliable connectivity.

  • Customer Support & Incident Ownership

  • Remotely troubleshoot and resolve technical issues over phone and remote tools, taking full ownership from initial contact to resolution.
  • Communicate complex technical issues and solutions clearly to non-technical or less tech-savvy users.
  • Provide timely updates to customers during incidents, escalations, and service restoration activities.
  • Handle after-hours and emergency support requests on a rotational on-call basis.
  • Perform incident, problem, and change management activities in line with ITIL processes, including triage, escalation, RCA, and post-incident reviews.

  • Conduct root cause analysis (RCA) for recurring or critical incidents and implement preventive measures to reduce future outages.

  • Documentation & Collaboration

  • Document incidents, resolutions, and troubleshooting steps in the call tracking / ticketing system in accordance with defined documentation standards.
  • Develop and maintain runbooks, SOPs, and knowledge articles for recurring issues.
  • Build strong working relationships with customers and internal teams to improve service quality and operational efficiency.

Job Specification / Skills and Competencies

  • Minimum 2 years of experience in a technical customer support, infrastructure support, or systems administration role.
  • Hands-on experience supporting Windows Server environments, networking, and firewalls.
  • Strong knowledge of Microsoft Azure infrastructure and services.
  • Solid Windows system administration skills (Active Directory, RDS, file services, print services).
  • Strong networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, DNS, routing, VPNs, firewalls).
  • Hands-on experience with Fortinet / FortiGate firewalls or similar enterprise firewalls.
  • Experience with monitoring, alerting, and incident management tools.
  • Excellent troubleshooting and analytical problem-solving skills.
  • Strong customer service mindset with the ability to remain calm under pressure.
  • Ability to communicate complex technical concepts clearly to novice or non-technical users.
  • Ability to work independently while effectively leveraging available tools, documentation, and team support.
  • Strong documentation, time management, and multitasking skills.

Certifications Desired

  • Cloud Certifications, ITIL Certifications, CompTIA Network+ Certification or equivalent.
  • Experience administering and troubleshooting enterprise firewalls such as Cisco, Fortinet, Palo Alto, or similar.

Work Model

  • 24×7 shift-based operations on a rotation basis, including weekends and holidays.
  • On-call and after-hours support on a rotational basis.
  • Role includes both L1 and L2 responsibilities with full ownership of incidents.
  • To adhere to the Information Security Management policies and procedures.

Contact

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at padma.soorya@experionglobal.com.

About Way.com

Way.com — America’s dominant automotive super app, powering every mile for over 10 million customers—from auto insurance and parking to EV charging and more. Leveraging cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and advanced data analytics, we deliver innovative, personalized solutions that transform car ownership. Featured by Bloomberg and ranked 48th on Andreessen Horowitz’s Marketplace list of fastest-growing companies worldwide and recognized as the top Product in Insurance by UnitQ, we’re making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Role Overview

You will play a crucial role in helping launch new programs, assist with training customer service managers, engage with customers, and manage ongoing program success within our Way+ Vertical. This role will have a heavy focus on the monitoring and reporting of the SLAs and Customer Service efforts for each of our partnerships. You will be required to understand all partner operations and be knowledge experts in the Way+ vertical, staying up to date with any product or program changes. You will use this knowledge to effectively assist customers, team members, and vendors in relation to any questions, escalations, and daily operational needs. This role involves training, coaching, monitoring, and managing the verticals to both achieve customer and partner satisfaction and program service level objectives.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Program Launch & Management: Assist with the launch of new programs, ensuring all components are executed effectively and meet project objectives. Monitor program performance and make adjustments as needed to achieve success.
  • Training and Development: Provide ongoing coaching and feedback to enhance performance.
  • Customer Engagement: Assist the CS Team in resolving complex customer issues or escalations. Monitor and evaluate customer interactions for quality assurance. Engage with customers to provide support, answer queries, and promote program initiatives. Address customer feedback and concerns to enhance satisfaction and program success.
  • Performance Management: Track key performance metrics and report on team performance to higher management.
  • Process Improvement: Identify opportunities to improve processes and procedures. Collaborate with other departments to address systemic issues affecting customer and partner satisfaction.
  • Training: Develop and deliver training materials and sessions for staff and partners to ensure they are well-prepared to implement and support new programs.
  • Program Reporting: Run and analyze reports to assess program performance and identify areas for improvement. Prepare detailed reports for management review.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in quality control, customer engagement, or a related field, with a proven ability to manage multiple responsibilities effectively.
  • Skills: Strong organizational and multitasking skills, excellent problem-solving abilities, and effective communication skills. Proficiency in using relevant software and tools for program management and reporting including Excel.
  • Flexibility: Ability to adapt to last-minute changes and partner requirements with a proactive approach.

Why you will love working with us?

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Opportunity to make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.
summary: Lead program launches and customer engagement for Way.com's Way+ Vertical, ensuring SLA compliance and partner satisfaction through training and process improvements. Drive program success with data-driven reporting and cross-departmental collaboration in a fast-paced tech environment.

Azure Cloud Infrastructure Support (L1 & L2) - Provide 24X7 monitoring, support, and maintenance of Azure cloud infrastructure. - Use Azure Monitor, Log Analytics, and third-party tools for real-time monitoring and alert response. - Manage Azure Virtual Machines (Windows/Linux) for provisioning, scaling, patching, and troubleshooting. - Support Azure networking components (VNets, NSGs, Load Balancers, etc.) and Azure Active Directory/Entra ID. - Administer Azure Storage services (Blob, File, Disk) and PaaS services (App Services, Azure SQL, AKS). - Perform capacity planning, performance analysis, and cost optimization.

System Administration & Remote Support - Manage Windows Terminal Server/RDS environments and act as a Remote Administrator for customer Windows Servers. - Support Windows print services, server backup/restore, and OS patching across Windows/Linux.

Networking & Firewall Administration - Administer Fortinet/FortiGate firewalls, including policy management and site-to-site/dial-up VPNs. - Troubleshoot WAN/LAN/VPN connectivity and collaborate with network teams.

Customer Support & Incident Ownership - Remotely resolve technical issues via phone/remote tools, providing full ownership from triage to resolution. - Communicate technical solutions to non-technical users and provide incident updates. - Handle on-call support and perform ITIL-aligned incident management (RCA, post-incident reviews).

Documentation & Collaboration - Document incidents, resolutions, and maintain runbooks/SOPs. - Build relationships with customers and teams to improve service quality.

Preferred Skills

  • Minimum 2 years in technical support, infrastructure, or systems administration.
  • Hands-on experience with Windows Server, networking, and firewalls.
  • Strong Azure infrastructure knowledge and Windows system administration (Active Directory, RDS).
  • Networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, DNS, routing, firewalls).
  • Experience with Fortinet/FortiGate or similar firewalls.
  • Monitoring/alerting tools and ITIL processes.
  • Excellent troubleshooting, communication, and documentation skills.

Certifications Desired

  • Cloud certifications (e.g., Azure), ITIL, CompTIA Network+.
  • Enterprise firewall administration experience (Cisco, Palo Alto, etc.).

Work Model

  • 24×7 shift-based operations (weekends/holidays included).
  • On-call/after-hours support on rotation.
  • L1/L2 responsibilities with full incident ownership.
  • Adherence to Information Security Management policies.
summary: A Site Reliability Engineer is needed to support 24×7 Azure cloud environments, ensuring high availability and performance. Requires 3-8 years of experience in Azure infrastructure, system administration, and networking.
